sentences.en: Despite our assertions about the desirability of probabilistic estimates the problem is not statistical.
sentences.cn: 尽管我们对预计的几率提出希求,预测的问题仍然不是统计学性的.
这真是件让人称心的东西.

sentences.en: Mel was conscious, as at other times, of her desirability and warmth.
sentences.cn: 梅尔像往常一样, 感到她的希求和温情.

sentences.en: Modern times technology development at very fast speed, it makes what people's this desirability come true.
sentences.cn: 现代科学技术的飞速发展, 使得人们这一愿望得以实现.

sentences.en: Speculation as to the desirability of this process is an unprofitable pastime.
sentences.cn: 猜测这一进程有何可取之处是无益之举.

sentences.en: The desirability , alternative, and mobility of employment opportunity perception is positive effect on turnover intention.
sentences.cn: 就业机会认知之转业动机 、 职缺具体度、可移动性对离职意图产生正向影响.

sentences.en: The desirability of peace needs no affirmation.
The managing director doubted the desirability of a negotiation to be held at this time.
sentences.cn: 译文:总经理认为此时举行谈判并无必要.

sentences.en: The practicality of achieving this has, of course, not been considered, let alone the desirability.
sentences.cn: 当然, 实现这个目标的可行性并不在考虑范围内, 更不用说它的必要性了.

sentences.en: The testing results show that the performance of the bridge unit reaches the comparative perfect desirability.
sentences.cn: 测试结果表明,该桥接器的性能达到较为理想的要求.

sentences.en: They clearly thought he needed prodding on the desirability of relaxing tensions.
sentences.cn: 他们显然认为,他需要力陈一下缓和紧张局势的好处.

sentences.en: To taste, sample, or otherwise test in order to determine strength, effect, worth, or desirability.
sentences.cn: 试验,尝试尝试, 取样或侧试以决定力度, 效果, 价值或受欢迎程度.

sentences.en: We trust that you will see the desirability of avoid such proceeding.
sentences.cn: 我们相信您会明白避免诉诸法律的客观必要性.

words.tran_cn: 渴望，要求（desire的过去分词形式）
愿望；有利条件；值得向往的事物；合意
